entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
As the title of this post says... Welcome! This blog was originally meant to showcase a dark material theme I planned on creating, but then, I realized I didn't know diddly squat about making themes, so I just made a plain old blog instead.

If you think that's silly, then let me tell you, I don't even know what I'm going to do with it!

Maybe I'll just use it for experimentation or some such. I donno.

Either way, I'm keeping this repo name, I quite like it.
